reuters.title: CARGILL U.K. STRIKE TALKS POSTPONED TILL MONDAY
reuters.body: Talks set for today between management and unions to try to solve the labour dispute at Cargill U.K. Ltd's Seaforth oilseed crushing plant have been rescheduled for Monday, a company spokesman said. Oilseed processing at the mill has been at a standstill since December 19. REUTER 
